ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: The main aim of our All India Level Educational Society is to remove illiteracy from members of the minority and other socially and unprivileged sections of society, as also to equip them with skills to enable these members to lead a life of dignity and self respect. Accordingly the society setup an English Medium school named as Gharibnawaz School of Excellence in Ginnori locality of Bhopal in the year 2003 which is affiliated with MP Board of Secondary Education Bhopal from KG to Class X. The school is imparting quality education to the students at very nominal tuition fee and the results have so far been very encouraging. We have purchased 2.5 acres of land in village Arwaliya which is about 8 kms from Bhopal town where we propose to construct a proper school building with hostel facility as the present building is small is not able to accommodate more students. We have also opened a Vocational Training Centre named as Umang in our school premises which provides training free of cost to women coming from poor families in trades like cutting and tailoring, computer applications and artificial jewellery. So far we have over 1000 poor ladies most of whom have started their own business specially in cutting and tailoring trades enabling them to earn sufficient money to meet their household expenses. We have resolved this charitable work in our institution. In addition our school takes active part extra curricular activities including sports and academics. We are happy to state that our school took part in a state level academic competition called Bal Rung in which the students wrote an excellent article on Goa which has been submitted to Manav Sangralaya, Indira Gandhi Bhawan, Shyamla Hills, Bhopal. In addition our students regularly take part in social and educational activities organised by Urdu Academy Govt of MP Bhopal as for example one held recently on famous poet Iqbal. Our school organises outdoor trip to historical places every year. We also have social gatherings and fates every year in our school. Our students also take part in debates and recently took part in reciting Naths (sufi poetry) organised by the local municipal councellor in which prices were one by them. We plan to open a Play school and Nursery classes in our school premises from next academic year we have also drawn up a calender of events highlighting the extra curricular activities which would be undertaken in the year 2017 - 2018.
